entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:09 a.m. EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow and local blowing snow beginning near midnight. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
